Data Fields
sos_board_config_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS

Stratify Board Configuration Structure. More...

#include <sos.h>

Detailed Description

This structure holds the compiler-link time configuration data.

Data Fields

u8 clk_usecond_tmr
 
u8 task_total
 
u16 start_stack_size
 
const char * stdin_dev
 
const char * stdout_dev

int o_sys_flags

void(* request )(void)
 

Field Documentation

u8 sos_board_config_t::clk_usecond_tmr

tmr used for usecond counter

int sos_board_config_t::o_sys_flags

System flags

void(* sos_board_config_t::request) (void)

Send an interrupt request to the link master (0 if not supported)

const sos_socket_api_t* sos_board_config_t::socket_api

Socket API (zero if sockets are not supported)

void*(* sos_board_config_t::start) (void *)

The start routine (when in doubt use sos_default_thread())

void* sos_board_config_t::start_args

Arguments passed to the start routine (for sos_default_thread() use a pointer to the link transport driver)

u16 sos_board_config_t::start_stack_size

Stack size of the first thread (when in doubt use SOS_DEFAULT_START_STACK_SIZE)

const char* sos_board_config_t::stderr_dev

Device used for standard error

const char* sos_board_config_t::stdin_dev

Device used for standard input

const char* sos_board_config_t::stdout_dev

Device used for standard output

const char* sos_board_config_t::sys_id

System ID (globally unique cloud identifier for board)

int sos_board_config_t::sys_memory_size

Memory size reserved for the system

const char* sos_board_config_t::sys_name

System (or board) name

const char* sos_board_config_t::sys_version

System (or board) version (distinct from kernel version)

u8 sos_board_config_t::task_total

Total number of supported tasks

const char* sos_board_config_t::trace_dev

Device used for tracing

void(* sos_board_config_t::trace_event) (void *event)

This will trace an event (zero if not supported)
